title: Audio Emitter
description: A positional or global audio emitter.

anyOf.description: Global audio emitters are not affected by the position of audio listeners.

gain.description: Unitless multiplier against original source volume for determining emitter loudness.

loop.description: Whether or not to loop the specified audio clip when finished.

playing.description: Whether or not the specified audio clip is playing. Setting this property true will set the audio clip to play on load (autoplay).

source.description: The id of the audio source referenced by this audio emitter.
